devdoc.details: This contract is the primary contract powering RariFund. Anyone can deposit to the fund with deposit(string currencyCode, uint256 amount). Anyone can withdraw their funds (with interest) from the fund with withdraw(string currencyCode, uint256 amount).

approveTo0x(string,uint256).details: Approves tokens to 0x without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be approved.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be approved.

approveToPool(uint8,string,uint256).details: Approves tokens to the pool without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be approved.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be approved.

authorizeFundManagerDataSource(address).details: Upgrades RariFundManager. Authorizes the source for fund manager data (i.e., the old fund manager).

params.authorizedFundManagerDataSource: Authorized source for data (i.e., the old fund manager).

balanceOf(address).details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getRawFundBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

params.account: The account whose balance we are calculating.

constructor.details: Constructor that sets supported ERC20 token contract addresses and supported pools for each supported token.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be deposited.

depositTo(address,string,uint256).details: Deposits funds from `msg.sender` (RariFundProxy) to RariFund in exchange for RFT minted to `to`. You may only deposit currencies accepted by the fund (see `isCurrencyAccepted(string currencyCode)`). Please note that you must approve RariFundManager to transfer at least `amount`.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be deposited.
params.to: The address that will receieve the minted RFT.

depositToPool(uint8,string,uint256).details: Deposits funds from any supported pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be deposited.

disableFund().details: Disables primary functionality of this RariFundManager so contract(s) can be upgraded.

enableFund().details: Enables primary functionality of this RariFundManager once contract(s) are upgraded.

getFundBalance().details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getRawFundBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

getInterestAccrued().details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getRawFundBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

getInterestFeeRate().details: Returns the fee rate on interest.

getInterestFeesGenerated().details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getRawFundBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

getInterestFeesUnclaimed().details: Returns the total unclaimed amount of interest fees. Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getRawFundBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

getRawFundBalance().details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getRawFundBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

getRawFundBalance(string).details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `RariFundController.getPoolBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

params.currencyCode: The currency code of the balance to be calculated.

getRawInterestAccrued().details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getRawFundBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

getRawPoolBalances(string).details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `RariFundController.getPoolBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

params.currencyCode: The currency code of the balance to be calculated.

getRawPoolBalances(string).return: An array of arrays of pool indexes and balances.

interestAccruedBy(address).details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getRawFundBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

params.account: The account whose interest we are calculating.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

marketSell0xOrdersFillOrKill((address,ad.details: Market sell to 0x exchange orders (reverting if `takerAssetFillAmount` is not filled). We should be able to make this function external and use calldata for all parameters, but Solidity does not support calldata structs (https://github.com/ethereum/solidity/issues/5479).

params.orders: The limit orders to be filled in ascending order of price.
params.takerAssetFillAmount: The amount of the taker asset to sell (excluding taker fees).

onFundTokenTransfer(address,address,uint.details: Recieves data about an RFT transfer or burn from RariFundToken so we can record it in `_netDepositsByAccount`.

params.newRftTotalSupply: The total supply of RFT after the transfer or burn.
params.recipient: The recipient of the RFT (the zero address if burning).
params.rftAmount: The amount of RFT transferred or burnt.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

ownerWithdraw(string).details: Withdraws fund manager balance of `currencyCode` to the team if withdrawable.

params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to withdraw.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAcceptedCurrency(string,bool).details: Marks `currencyCode` as accepted or not accepted.

params.accepted: A boolean indicating if the `currencyCode` is to be accepted.
params.currencyCode: The currency code to mark as accepted or not accepted.

setDefaultAccountBalanceLimit(uint256).details: Sets or upgrades the default account balance limit in USD.

params.limitUsd: The default fund balance limit per Ethereum address in USD.

setFundManagerData((int256,int256,int256.details: Upgrades RariFundManager. Sets data receieved from the old contract.

params.data: The data from the old contract necessary to initialize the new contract.

setFundProxy(address).details: Sets or upgrades the RariFundProxy of the RariFundManager.

params.newContract: The address of the new RariFundProxy contract.

setFundRebalancer(address).details: Sets or upgrades the rebalancer of the RariFundManager.

params.newAddress: The Ethereum address of the new rebalancer server.

setFundToken(address).details: Sets or upgrades the RariFundToken of the RariFundManager.

params.newContract: The address of the new RariFundToken contract.

setIndividualAccountBalanceLimit(address.details: Sets the balance limit in USD of `account`.

params.account: The Ethereum address to add or remove.
params.limitUsd: The fund balance limit of `account` in USD. Use 0 to unset individual limit (and restore account to global limit). Use -1 to disable deposits from `account`.

setInterestFeeMasterBeneficiary(address).details: Sets the master beneficiary of interest fees.

params.beneficiary: The master beneficiary of fees on interest; i.e., the recipient of all fees on interest.

setInterestFeeRate(uint256).details: Sets the fee rate on interest.

params.rate: The proportion of interest accrued to be taken as a service fee (scaled by 1e18).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeFundManager(address).details: Upgrades RariFundManager. Sends data to the new contract, sets the new RariFundToken minter, and forwards tokens from the old to the new.

params.newContract: The address of the new RariFundManager contract.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be withdrawn.

withdrawAllFromPool(uint8,string).details: Withdraws all funds from any supported pool.

params.currencyCode: The ERC20 contract of the token to be withdrawn.
The currency code of the interest fees to be claimed.

withdrawFrom(address,string,uint256).details: Withdraws funds from RariFund to `msg.sender` (RariFundProxy) in exchange for RFT burned from `from`. You may only withdraw currencies held by the fund (see `getRawFundBalance(string currencyCode)`). Please note that you must approve RariFundManager to burn of the necessary amount of RFT.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be withdrawn.
params.from: The address from which RFT will be burned.

withdrawFromPool(uint8,string,uint256).details: Withdraws funds from any supported pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be withdrawn.

devdoc.title: RariFundManager

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns an account's total balance in USD (scaled by 1e18).

deposit(string,uint256).notice: Deposits funds to RariFund in exchange for RFT. You may only deposit currencies accepted by the fund (see `isCurrencyAccepted(string currencyCode)`). Please note that you must approve RariFundManager to transfer at least `amount`.

depositFees().notice: Deposits all accrued fees on interest back into the fund on behalf of the master beneficiary.

getFundBalance().notice: Returns the fund's total investor balance (all RFT holders' funds but not unclaimed fees) of all currencies in USD (scaled by 1e18).

getInterestAccrued().notice: Returns the total amount of interest accrued by past and current RFT holders (excluding the fees paid on interest) in USD (scaled by 1e18).

getInterestFeesGenerated().notice: Returns the amount of interest fees accrued by beneficiaries in USD (scaled by 1e18).

getRawFundBalance().notice: Returns the fund's raw total balance (all RFT holders' funds + all unclaimed fees) of all currencies in USD (scaled by 1e18).

getRawFundBalance(string).notice: Returns the fund's raw total balance (all RFT holders' funds + all unclaimed fees) of the specified currency.

getRawInterestAccrued().notice: Returns the raw total amount of interest accrued by the fund as a whole (including the fees paid on interest) in USD (scaled by 1e18).

getRawPoolBalances(string).notice: Returns the fund's raw balance (all RFT holders' funds + all unclaimed fees) in each pool of the specified currency.

interestAccruedBy(address).notice: Returns the total amount of interest accrued by `account` (excluding the fees paid on interest) in USD (scaled by 1e18).

isCurrencyAccepted(string).notice: Returns a boolean indicating if deposits in `currencyCode` are currently accepted.

withdraw(string,uint256).notice: Withdraws funds from RariFund in exchange for RFT. You may only withdraw currencies held by the fund (see `getRawFundBalance(string currencyCode)`). Please note that you must approve RariFundManager to burn of the necessary amount of RFT.

withdrawFees(string).notice: Withdraws all accrued fees on interest to the master beneficiary.
